sentences.en: After delivering you bowl jellied bean curd to finish eating, laughed.
sentences.cn: 送你一碗豆腐花,吃完之后笑哈哈.

sentences.en: Cole: salt vegetable, pickle , salt bean curd, peanut, season vegetable.
sentences.cn: 小菜: 腌菜干, 豆腐乳,泡菜, 花生米, 时令蔬菜.

sentences.en: Dried bean curd of this brand has two flavors , spice and fennel.
sentences.cn: 我吃米饭的时候喜欢加些豆腐乳.

sentences.en: He loves having jellied bean curd in the morning for breakfast.
sentences.cn: 他早晨喜欢吃一碗豆腐脑儿.

sentences.en: I had bread with fermented bean curd for breakfast.
sentences.cn: 我今天的早点是豆乳加面包.

sentences.en: I suspected there was some stimulants inside the bean curd.
sentences.cn: 这么兴奋,豆腐里面不会有兴奋剂吧?

sentences.en: I'd like to add some pepper to the bean curd.
sentences.cn: 我想在豆腐里加一点辣椒粉.

sentences.en: I'd like to add some pepper to the curd.
sentences.cn: 我想在豆腐“里加”一点辣椒粉.

sentences.en: Is there any connection between making bean curd and killing?
sentences.cn: 做豆腐和杀人有什么关系?

sentences.en: Ma Po's bean curd is a specialty in our restaurant.
sentences.cn: 本店的当家菜是麻婆豆腐.

sentences.en: May: Grilled corn, glutinous dumplings, fried peanuts, and bean curd jelly.
sentences.cn: 阿美: 烤玉米 、 汤圆 、 炸花生和豆腐脑.

sentences.en: Processed bean curd is a popular traditional breakfast in the northern region.
sentences.cn: 吃火锅的时候,绿豆芽可以涮着吃.

sentences.en: Spinach with bean curd is one of my favourite dishes.
sentences.cn: 菠菜豆腐是我最爱吃的一种菜.

sentences.en: Sure. Then, you can go and eat fried bean curd.
sentences.cn: 当然, 然后你再去品尝油炸豆腐.

words.tran_cn: （使）成凝乳；（使）凝结；（使）变质（curdle的ing形式）

trans.tran_en: the thick substance that forms in milk when it becomes sour
